beer.beer_description: Brewed with Beer Cartel for the 2025 Advent Calendar, this juicy NZ Hazy Pale shines with tropical fruit and ripe pineapple from Nectaron, Rakau and Nelson Sauvin hops. Golden haze, smooth malt. Happy holidays!

items.badge_description: Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 75 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 16!

items.checkin_comment: #16 of Beer Cartel’s 25 beer Advent Calendar. Smooth malty hazy with citrus notes.

Ahh, the trusty pale ale; crisp, refreshing, and always a good choice in a bind. That's 115 different Pale Ales or American Pale Wheats. Try 5 more for Level 24.

You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 90 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 19!
